nodes.text: Dark Times—Fire Carrier 5 is the twenty-seventh issue of the Star Wars: Dark Times comic series and the fifth in the Fire Carrier story arc.

Jedi Master K'Kruhk's fight with militia soldiers comes to an abrupt end—with the appearance of not one, but two unexpected allies. The refuge he and his Padawans have sought may be in sight . . .
but a shadow from within their own ranks bodes a perilous future.
